sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function MentorProfile() { const [isMessageOpen, setIsMessageOpen] = useState(false); const { id } = useParams(); // This would be fetched from the backend in a real application const mentor = { id: 1, name: 'Sarah Johnson', title: 'Senior Software Engineer at Tech Corp', expertise: ['React', 'Node.js', 'MongoDB', 'System Design'], experience: '5+ years', availability: 'Weekends', rating: 4.8, totalMentees: 45, successRate: '92%', imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=4&w=320&h=320&q=80', bio: 'Passionate about helping developers grow and succeed. Specialized in full-stack development and system architecture. Led multiple successful hackathon teams.', achievements: [ 'Best Mentor Award 2024', 'Led team to first place in Global Hackathon 2023', '100+ successful mentorship sessions' ], languages: ['English', 'Spanish'], timezone: 'PST', testimonials: [ { text: 'Sarah was instrumental in helping our team win the hackathon. Her guidance on system design was invaluable.', author: 'Mike Chen', role: 'Software Developer' } ] }; return (
{/* Profile Header */}
{/* Profile Content */}

{mentor.name}

{mentor.title}

{/* Stats */}

Rating

{mentor.rating}/5.0

Mentees

{mentor.totalMentees}

Success Rate

{mentor.successRate}

{/* Bio */}

About

{mentor.bio}

{/* Expertise */}

Expertise

{mentor.expertise.map((skill) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* Achievements */}

Achievements

    {mentor.achievements.map((achievement, index) => (
  • {achievement}
    • ))}
{/* Testimonials */}

Testimonials

{mentor.testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (

"{testimonial.text}"

{testimonial.author}

{testimonial.role}

))}
{/* Chat Modal */} {isMessageOpen && (

Message {mentor.name}
